status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"6har5","text":"Summary\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j98j","text":"The 12S protocol is aimed at amplifying the hypervariable region of the mitochondrial DNA 12S rRNA gene in eukaryotes. The primers (MiFish-U-F \u0026 MiFish-U-R) used in this protocol were developed by Miya et al., 2015 for metabarcoding environmental DNA (eDNA) from fishes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6h8r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4kii","text":"This work was supported by the David and Lucile Packard Foundation, and NASA award 80NSSC21M0032 and NOAA award NA22NOS0120184 in support of the CeNCOOS MBON.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ub6l","text":"Method description and rationale\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pqir","text":"This protocol follows an updated version of the MiFish primer PCR protocol. The Platinum SuperFi II was designed to have high fidelity and have increased resistance to PCR inhibitors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87o37","text":"Spatial coverage and environment(s) of relevance\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3f8pi","text":"This protocol has been used to amplify extracted DNA from filtered sea water samples taken from marine coastal stations off the western coast of North America (primarily off of California).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbi5t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0idg","text":"sea water [ENVO:00002149]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64mda","text":"http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ENVO_00002149","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":44}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CD4930BC832F11EEAC7A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ENVO_00002149"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"denhv","text":"Personnel Required\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75gad","text":"1 technician.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24l4l","text":"Safety\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1d9un","text":"Identify hazards associated with the procedure and specify protective equipment and safety training required to safely execute the procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gce7","text":"Training requirements\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f96u6","text":"Sterile technique, pipetting skills.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brb83","text":"Time needed to execute the procedure\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7cjj","text":"Total time is 7 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5he3m","text":"PCR preparation and running the PCR protocol takes 3 hours. Running the following gel is 1 hour, bead cleanup setup preparation and process takes 2 hours, and then another gel is run for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

QUANTITY Provide quantities necessary for one application of the standard operating procedure (e.g. number of filters).
REMARK For example, some of the consumable may need to be sterilized, some commercial solution may need to be diluted or shielded from light during the operating procedure.

{"blocks":[{"key":"2u98k","text":"In the following SOP, please use the exact names of equipment as noted in the table above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61aqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2012h","text":"Provide a step-by-step description of the protocol. The identification of difficult steps in the protocol and the provision of recommendations for the execution of those steps are encouraged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1i8bc","text":"BEFORE STARTING","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71fds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p8kp","text":"Disinfect work surfaces with 10% bleach or RNase Away followed by a MilliQ / DI water rinse and 70% ethanol wipe. Clean pipet surfaces with RNase Away and ethanol wipe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ema6","text":"UV pipets, molecular grade water, and tube racks for 30 minutes prior to starting protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qfha","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f05l4","text":"1. eDNA template & PCR processing were performed at the Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute (MBARI). PCR reactions for the 12S locus were performed with a two-step amplification protocol for each sample using the MiFish_U primers (Miya et al. 2015) with Fluidigm adapters CS1 & CS2. All primers listed in the 5’ to 3’ direction. MiFish primers are in bold.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lh02","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0nvm","text":"Fluidigm CS1+MiFish_U (forward):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ea2c0","text":"ACACTGACGACATGGTTCTACA GTCGGTAAAACTCGTGCCAGC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7d5se","text":"Fluidigm CS2+Mifish_U (reverse):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kpc5","text":"TACGGTAGCAGAGACTTGGTCT CATAGTGGGGTATCTAATCCCAGTTTG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":23,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96mpd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bl0i","text":"  
PCR Primer Name
Direction
Sequence (5’ -> 3’)
   
content
forward
content
 
content
reverse
content
  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":105}],"data":{}},{"key":"eqpmq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","C_1":{"className":" "}},"colTitles":["PCR Primer Name","Direction","Sequence (5’ -> 3’)"],"colWidths":["156.984375","104","211.984375"],"data":[["Fluidigm CS1 + 12S MiFish_U","forward","ACACTGACGACATGGTTCTACAGTCGGTAAAACTCGTGCCAGC"],["Fluidigm CS2 + 12S MiFish_U","reverse","TACGGTAGCAGAGACTTGGTCTCATAGTGGGGTATCTAATCCCAGTTTG"]],"guid":"0EB86ED2C52740CF832C0D06DE0853CD","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Fluidigm CS1 + 12S MiFish_U","forward","ACACTGACGACATGGTTCTACAGTCGGTAAAACTCGTGCCAGC"],["Fluidigm CS2 + 12S MiFish_U","reverse","TACGGTAGCAGAGACTTGGTCTCATAGTGGGGTATCTAATCCCAGTTTG"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eb7qn","text":"1. After primary PCR amplification of the marker region the PCR product was run through a 2% agarose gel to confirm the presence of target bands (~270 bp) and absence of non-specific amplification (bacterial band ~370 bp) across environmental samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a5b6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2eidl","text":"Primary PCR clean-up (Bead Clean-up Protocol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":22}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BDCE6D99831B11EEAB650A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://mbari-bog.github.io/MBON-Protocols/Bead_cleanup.html"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bh4a","text":"An agarose gel was run after secondary PCR to confirm the presence of target bands and absence of non-specific amplification across environmental samples as well as the absence of amplification in NTCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0e2k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kimc","text":"Products from the protocol are then used to create a pooled library and sequenced following a separate sequencing protocol (such as \"Environmental DNA (eDNA) 12S Metabarcoding Illumina MiSeq NGS Protocol with size selection V.2\", dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.eq2lyj1kelx9/v2 )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":230,"length":48}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"630B46E1A4EA11EEADDF0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.eq2lyj1kelx9/v2"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8h5c0","text":"Identify known issues associated with the procedure, if any.\n\nProvide troubleshooting guidelines when available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6j67o","text":"Miya M et al. 2015 MiFish, a set of universal PCR primers for metabarcoding environmental DNA from fishes: detection of more than 230 subtropical marine species. R.Soc.opensci. 2: 150088. http://dx.doi.org/10.1098/rsos.150088","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":188,"length":37}],"data":{}},{"key":"8giet","text":"Kawato, M., Yoshida, T., Miya, M., Tsuchida, S., Nagano, Y., Nomura, M., Yabuki, A., Fujiwara, Y. and Fujikura, K., 2021. Optimization of environmental DNA extraction and amplification methods for metabarcoding of deep-sea fish. MethodsX, 8, p.101238. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.mex.2021.101238","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":252,"length":41}],"data":{}},{"key":"kdf8","text":"Platinum SuperFi II PCR Master Mix User Guide","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":45}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5D34DDAC831911EE92B50A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.1098/rsos.150088"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5D34DDAC831911EE92B50A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1016/j.mex.2021.101238"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5D34DDAC831911EE92B50A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/document-connect/document-connect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.thermofisher.com%2FTFS-Assets%2FLSG%2Fmanuals%2FMAN0018860_Platinum_SuperFi_II_PCR_MM_UG.pdf"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj874","text":"Link templates (e.g. preformatted spreadsheets) used to record measurements and report on the quality of the data as well as any documents such as manufacturer specifications, images, etc that support this protocol. Please include a short note describing the document’s relevance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bgfo","text":"4. Primary 12S cycling parameters, using the manufacturer’s recommendation with a slight modification. The Platinum SuperFi II is designed to be used with a universal 60°C annealing temperature, however, we found we had better results with an annealing temperature of 62°C to reduce bacterial co-amplification:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f10ng","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1s44v","text":"

{"blocks":[{"key":"catl","text":"2. The primary PCR amplifications were carried out in singleton 50 μl reactions using:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e57q5","text":"25 μL 2X Platinum SuperFi II PCR MM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5q52","text":"3 μL forward primer (10 μM)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h0q5","text":"3 μL reverse primer (10 μM)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lmqq","text":"3 μL eDNA extract template","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pj61","text":"16 μL molecular-grade, nuclease-free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8m54","text":"3. PCR reactions were performed in 96-well plates with a no-template control (NTC) for each PCR plate, for a total of 3 PCR negative controls. An artificial community was used as a positive control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"foq4g","text":"2. Primary PCR products were purified and size selected using the Agencourt AMPure XP bead system (Beckman Coulter, USA) at 0.9x volume beads to product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4h3nn","text":"3. A second agarose gel was run to confirm primer removal and retention of target amplicons after purification. NTCs were also tested using a Qubit dsDNA 1x high sensitivity kit to ensure no amplification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"10hbq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57sp8","text":"The following steps are performed by MSU’s RTSF Genomics Core","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":61},{"style":"italic","offset":36,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":24}],"data":{}},{"key":"fg6pt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edlp8","text":"1. Secondary amplification and NGS were performed at Michigan State University’s Research Technology Support Facility (RTSF). An aliquot of 20 μL from each purified primary PCR product was sent to RTSF Genomics Core at MSU for secondary PCR amplification with primers which targeted the CS1/CS2 ends of the primary PCR products and added dual indexed, Illumina compatible adapters with barcodes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0al4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9od28","text":"PE1-BC-CS1 (forward): ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8flv","text":"AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGATCT-[i5-BC(index 2)]-ACACTGACGACATGGTTCTACA","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":65}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rj1k","text":"PE2-BC-CS2 (reverse): ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcg23","text":"CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGAT-[i7-BC(index 1)]-TACGGTAGCAGAGACTTGGTCT","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":64}],"data":{}},{"key":"af4ne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lsv7","text":"
